attributes.action: Ensure eligibility of signatures for govt e-petitions are verified.
attributes.additional_details: This site in no way has adequate measures in place to prevent automated activity by external parties or ineligible signatures. It is quite frankly appalling, a child could have done a better job. I have prepared plans for feasible measures which could be used on this site, I will happily provide them.
attributes.background: I'm sure you will find justification on this very site.

rejection.details: We're not sure what specific measures you would like to be put in place.  You could start a new petition explaining clearly what you would like us to do.
